overview: George Vidanov invites his handsome virile buddies over to his country estate for a weekend of merriment and intense mansex! Featuring a cast of uncut, big-dicked East European man like David Vidak, Martin Hubai, Marko Balazs, Zoly Mirlos, Fernando Lizallde, Janos Volt and Tomas Dombai. Plus Sandor Lenart as the gypsy who will dance and twirl his way into your heart.
title: Falcon Crest
